page.title: 04Steyning's Strange Stories
page.content: There are several strange stories about Steyning. In the church porch there is a pagan stone which was supposed to be magic and people wouldn't touch it. When Cuthman came to town he picked up the stone and put it down again. When nothing happened people thought he was magical so took notice of him. Cuthman's 2 oxen had been stolen by Fippa's two sons.So Cuthman yoked her two sons together and when Fippa tried to put a curse on Cuthman she was drawn up into the air and dropped into a muddy pool. Another supernatural story is that over by Chanctonbury ring a saxon man buried his treasure and after he died at Hastings his ghost was seen by the ring digging with a spade.The treasure was found by someone and the ghost hasn't been seen since.
